body_html: @vrv Thank you for lots of review. Is it possible to still keep bmp as a separate kernel. My original goal was to be able to have a simple image format for Android so that I can run something like label_image on Android without relying on external image libraries. Surely I can merge the bmp decoder into the single kernel if that's not possible.

body: @vrv Thank you for lots of review. Is it possible to still keep bmp as a separate kernel. My original goal was to be able to have a simple image format for Android so that I can run something like label_image on Android without relying on external image libraries. Surely I can merge the bmp decoder into the single kernel if that's not possible.
